abilityEffect.en: Any damage done to Probopass by your opponent's attacks is reduced by 10 for each [M] Energy attached to Probopass (after applying Weakness and Resistance). You can't reduce more than 20 damage in this way.

effect.en: Choose a number of your opponent's Benched Pokémon up to the amount of [M] Energy attached to Probopass. This attack does 20 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
